<td height="1" width="1"></td>
<td height="10" width="1"></td>
<td height="1" width="1"></td>
</tr>
</table>
<p style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt; text-align: center; width: 456pt;">F-15</p>
<br>
<hr width="760" style="padding-left: 0pt;" align="left">
<br>
<page>
<p style="font-family:serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;  width: 456pt; text-align: right; font-style: normal; line-height: 14pt; padding-top: 12pt; padding-left:0pt; padding-right:0pt; margin: 0pt; text-indent: pt; padding-bottom: 6pt; background-color: #ffffff;">CPI
AEROSTRUCTURES, INC.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br> NOTES TO FINANCIAL
STATEMENTS<br>December  31,
2005<br>
</p>
<!--0--><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="602">
<tr>
<td><img src="spacer.gif" width="1" height="8"></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td bgcolor="#000000"><img src="spacer.gif" height="5"><img src="spacer.gif" height="5" width="602"></td>
<td><img src="spacer.gif" height="5" width="0"></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><img src="spacer.gif" height="8" width="5"></td>
</tr>
</table>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" width="602">
<tr>
<td height="1"><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="20"></td>
<td height="1"><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="230"></td>
<td height="1"><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="15"></td>
<td height="1"><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="337"></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt;"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-style: normal;">10.
</font></td>
<td valign="top" style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt;"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-style: normal;">EMPLOYEE STOCK OPTION
PLANS:</font></td>
<td><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="10"></td>
<td valign="top" style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt; padding-left: 0pt;">In April  1992, the Company adopted the
1992 Stock Option Plan (the &lsquo;&lsquo;1992 Plan&rsquo;&rsquo;).
The 1992 Plan, for which 83,334 common shares are reserved for
issuance, provides for the issuance of either incentive stock options
or nonqualified stock options to employees, consultants or others who
provide services to the Company. The options may not be exercised more
than five years from the date of issuance. No more options may be
granted under the 1992 Plan.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td height="1" width="1"></td>
<td height="10" width="1"></td>
<td height="1" width="1"></td>
</tr>
</table>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" width="602">
<tr>
<td height="1"><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="250"></td>
<td height="1"><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="15"></td>
<td height="1"><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="337"></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign="top"></td>
<td><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="10"></td>
<td valign="top" style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt; padding-left: 0pt;">In 1995, the Company adopted
the 1995 Stock Option Plan (the &lsquo;&lsquo;1995
Plan&rsquo;&rsquo;), as amended, for which 200,000 common shares are
reserved for issuance. The 1995 Plan provides for the issuance of
either incentive stock options or nonqualified stock options to
employees, consultants or others who provide services to the Company.
The options&rsquo; exercise price is equal to the closing price of the
Company&rsquo;s shares on the day of issuance, except for incentive
stock options granted to the Company&rsquo;s president, which are
exercisable at 110% of the closing price of the Company&rsquo;s
shares on the date of issuance.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td height="1" width="1"></td>
<td height="10" width="1"></td>
<td height="1" width="1"></td>
</tr>

<td height="1"><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="15"></td>
<td height="1"><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="337"></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign="top"></td>
<td><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="10"></td>
<td valign="top" style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt; padding-left: 0pt;">In 1998, the Company
adopted the 1998 Performance Equity Plan (the &lsquo;&lsquo;1998
Plan&rsquo;&rsquo;). The 1998 Plan, as amended, reserved 463,334
common shares for issuance. The 1998 Plan provides for the issuance of
either incentive stock options or nonqualified stock options to
employees, consultants or others who provide services to the Company.
The options&rsquo; exercise price is equal to the closing price of the
Company&rsquo;s shares on the day of issuance, except for incentive
stock options granted to the Company&rsquo;s president, which are
exercisable at 110% of the closing price of the Company&rsquo;s
shares on the date of issuance.</td>
</tr>

adopted the Performance Equity Plan 2000 (the &lsquo;&lsquo;2000
Plan&rsquo;&rsquo;). The 2000 Plan, as amended, reserved 1,230,000
common shares for issuance. The 2000 Plan provides for the issuance of
either incentive stock options or nonqualified stock options to
employees, consultants or others who provide services to the Company.
The options&rsquo; exercise price is equal to the closing price of the
Company&rsquo;s shares on the day of issuance, except for incentive
stock options granted to the Company&rsquo;s president, which are
exercisable at 110% of the closing price of the Company&rsquo;s
shares on the date of issuance.</td>

<td valign="top" style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt;"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-style: normal;">WARRANTS AND OPTIONS:</font></td>
<td><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="10"></td>
<td valign="top" style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt; padding-left: 0pt;">In
February  2003, the Company issued to an underwriter (and its
designees) warrants to purchase an aggregate of 200,000 shares of the
Company&rsquo;s common stock as compensation related to the
Company&rsquo;s public offering. The warrants are exercisable, in
whole or in part, at $4.40 per share from February  2004 through
February  2008. At December  31,  2005 and 2004,
warrants to purchase 195,000 shares remain outstanding.</td>

will match a percentage of each employee&rsquo;s contribution.

<td valign="top" style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt;"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-style: normal;">13.
</font></td>
<td valign="top" style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt;"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-style: normal;">MAJOR CUSTOMER:
</font></td>
<td><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="10"></td>
<td valign="top" style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt; padding-left: 0pt;">96% of the sales in 2005, 99% of the
sales in 2004 and 98% of sales in 2003 were to the U.S.
government.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td height="1" width="1"></td>
<td height="10" width="1"></td>
<td height="1" width="1"></td>
</tr>

</tr>
<tr>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-32.1
<SEQUENCE>10
<FILENAME>file007.htm
<DESCRIPTION>CERT 906
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>
</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY>


<page>
<p style="font-family:serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  width: 456pt; text-align: right; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt; padding-top: 12pt; padding-left:0pt; padding-right:0pt; margin: 0pt; text-indent: 0pt; padding-bottom: 0pt; background-color: #ffffff;">EXHIBIT
32.1</p>
<p style="font-family:serif;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  width: 456pt; text-align: center; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt; padding-top: 12pt; padding-left:0pt; padding-right:0pt; margin: 0pt; text-indent: pt; padding-bottom: 0pt; background-color: #ffffff;">CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO<br>18 U.S.C. SECTION
1350<br>AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO<br>SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY
ACT OF 2002</p>
<p style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  width: 456pt; text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt; padding-top:24pt; padding-left:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom: 0pt; margin: 0pt; text-indent: 20pt; background-color: #ffffff">In connection with the Annual Report of CPI
Aerostructures, Inc. (the &lsquo;&lsquo;Company&rsquo;&rsquo;) on
Form 10-K for the year ended December  31,  2005 as filed
with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the
&lsquo;&lsquo;Report&rsquo;&rsquo;), the undersigned, in the
capacities and on the date indicated below, hereby certifies pursuant
to 18 U.S.C. Section 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section 906 of the
Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:</p>
<p style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  width: 456pt; text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt; padding-top:6pt; padding-left:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom: 0pt; margin: 0pt; text-indent: 0pt; background-color: #ffffff">1.&emsp;the Report
fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the
Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and</p>
<p style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  width: 456pt; text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt; padding-top:6pt; padding-left:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom: 0pt; margin: 0pt; text-indent: 0pt; background-color: #ffffff">2.&emsp;the
information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material
respects, the financial condition and results of operation of the
Company.</p>
<p style="font-family:serif;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;  width: 456pt; text-align: left; font-style: normal; line-height: 12pt; padding-top:6pt; padding-left:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom: 6pt; margin: 0pt; text-indent: 0pt; background-color: #ffffff">Dated: March  30,
2006</p>
<div style="width: 593;">
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="593">
<tr>
<td style="font-family: serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; padding-top: 0;" valign="top" align="left" width="285"><img src="spacer.gif" height="1" width="285"></td>
<td style="font-family: serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; padding-top: 0;" valign="top" align="left"><u>&emsp;/s/ Edward J.
Fred</u>

and Secretary</td>
